name: Mist of Eridan - Granda Nova Chronicles
name_original: Mist of Eridan - Granda Nova Chronicles
description:
*ONLY OPTIMIZED FOR FULLSCREEN !*

Welcome to Eridan, the Cursed country where lies the most fascinating and dangerous source of Arcana. Lead your way thanks to your Flame through the Evil Mist and go as deep as you can.

  • Defeat your enemies in Dynamic RPG real-time battles
  • Adapt your tactics to Rotation System, and unleash your skills at the perfect timing
  • Best your own score ! Use the best of what your learned in the next Run !

---

This Game is a collection of remains from a greater project, alas canceled from Wareware Studio. Read more on the DevLog about it.
